full_summary:
----------------------------------------
E6TOR-20RM06 - Plumbing Supplies
===========================

*   Publication Date: 30 May 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: 7 July 2023 at 14:00 EST
*   Solicitation Number: WS3930467945
*   Reference Number: WS3930467945-Doc4011501738

**Procurement Details**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites vendors to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) to establish a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of plumbing supplies on an as-and-when-requested basis to authorized users in the Ontario region, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

The RFP seeks to establish a RMSO for plumbing supplies, listed in the Allpriser Redbook (Plumbing and Heating) Price Guide (Ontario Edition), to support the Department's facilities and infrastructure management requirements. The RMSO will be part of the Canadian Collaborative Procurement Initiative (CCPI).

**Key Requirements**

*   Respondents must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria.
*   Failure to demonstrate compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive.
*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 7 July 2023 by 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Eligible Suppliers**

This procurement is open to all eligible suppliers. However, Stream 2 of this procurement has been set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). To be considered, a supplier must
